articles.title: Gigantic 420-foot asteroid to pass Earth soon, reveals NASA; Know how close it will come - HT Tech
articles.description: A 420 feet wide, which is comparable to a whole building in terms of size, is expected to pass Earth by a close margin tomorrow, March 23. NASA has revealed details about its speed, distance of approach and more.
articles.content: Asteroids have been passing by Earth in abundance. Just a few days ago, as many as four space rocks flew past Earth in one day. While most of these asteroids that pass by Earth closely do not pose an… [+1859 chars]
